statements: SELECT * FROM perishable_goods_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM perishable_goods_inventory;
SELECT id, product_name, storage_location FROM perishable_goods_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM perishable_goods_inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM perishable_goods_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, expiration_date, storage_location FROM perishable_goods_inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM perishable_goods_inventory WHERE storage_location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM perishjson_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, storage_location FROM perishable_goods_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND (storage_location = 'Warehouse A' OR storage_location = 'Warehouse B');
SELECT * FROM perishable_goods_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY quantity DESC, expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM Inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2021-12-31' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%'
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity ASC, product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT id, product_name, expiration_date FROM Inventory ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%'
SELECT log_id, action_type, quantity_change FROM InventoryLogs WHERE quantity_change < 0 ORDER BY log_timestamp
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT MAX(expiration_date) FROM Inventory;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM Suppliers;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM Sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, expiration_date FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT s.*, p.supplier_name FROM Sales s JOIN Suppliers p ON s.product_id = p.id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT i.product_name, SUM(s.quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM Inventory i JOIN Sales s ON i.id = s.product_id GROUP BY i.product_name ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM Suppliers s JOIN Sales sa ON s.id = sa.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_sales DESC, supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT order_date, quantity_ordered FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND expiration_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT order_date, quantity_ordered FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM Sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity_sold >= 100 ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory JOIN Suppliers ON Inventory.id = Suppliers.id WHERE Inventory.quantity > 0 AND Suppliers.email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date, quantity_ordered FROM Orders WHERE quantity_ordered > 100;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT order_id, supplier_name, order_date, quantity_ordered FROM Orders JOIN Suppliers ON Orders.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold FROM Sales JOIN Inventory ON Sales.product_id = Inventory.id WHERE quantity_sold >= 50;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM Suppliers LEFT JOIN Orders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Orders.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
